name: Ball Fall (itch) (TheBarnold)
description:
MAJOR WARNING!!!

The audio for the coin collection is way too high for some reason, I didn't notice this in the unity editor, there is a way to turn this down. To fix this:

If you haven't hit play yet, click options  → then adjust the volume slider. 

If you have already hit play and are in the game, press ESC (this is buggy in the browser version of the game)  → click menu, then click options and then adjust the volume slider.

I am so sorry if you didn't read this before playing.

This game is not an ORIGINAL idea. However, I did program this myself on my own. This idea comes from the game falldown seen here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wiiza.falldown&hl=en .

This is my first game and I am enjoying making this and would love ideas!

For the current build I recommend going into fullscreen from the game menu not the browser way.

Credits :
